TopicTitle: KSP crashing when you open the map screen/space center inflight?

Articles.Content:
It all started when I got ksrss 0.7, now I can't play regularly because O can't access the map screen without freezing the entire pc

Tried to switch to stock system but the problem persists

Are you crashing with an error message, or locking up forcing a hard reset?

Share your log files. See post "How to Get Support".
